## Submit article {.unnumbered}

Thank you for your interest in submitting to the *Journal of Sustainable Technology in Agriculture (JOSTA)*.

Please ensure you have reviewed the [Author Guidelines](authorguide.qmd) before submission.

JOSTA provides an integrated **Author Portal** where you can register, upload manuscripts, track submission progress, and respond to reviewers, all through our secure and intuitive platform.

To submit your manuscript, click the button below:

<a href="jostasubmission.qmd" target="_blank" class="btn btn-outline-success"> <i class="bi bi-upload"></i> Submit Article </a>




If you encounter any issues during submission, please contact us at [support\@jostapubs.com](mailto:support@jostapubs.com).
